survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the satisfaction and effectiveness of home office setups among remote workers, including ergonomics, technology, and productivity factors.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and clear.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons (single-choice). Display all options vertically.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?

questions.question_text: Which of the following home office equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes (multi-choice). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following home office equipment do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face with your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text. Use a multi-line text input.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face with your home office setup?

questions.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically work from your home office?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with clear time ranges. Avoid overlapping ranges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons (single-choice). Display options vertically.

script.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically work from your home office?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your current home office setup to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/not sure question to gauge overall satisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons (single-choice). Display options horizontally.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your current home office setup to a colleague?
